line.originaltext: 1 (2 liter) bottle lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage, chilled

line.originaltext: In a plastic container, mix together cherry brandy, orange juice concentrate, lemonade concentrate, and cranberry juice.
In a plastic container, mix together cherry brandy, orange juice concentrate, lemonade concentrate, and cranberry juice.
line.annotation: combine({ing75, ing76, ing77, ing78}, ing80, "fruity drink", "mix")

line.originaltext: In a plastic container, mix together cherry brandy, orange juice concentrate, lemonade concentrate, and cranberry juice.
To serve, scoop desired amount of frozen mixture into a glass, and fill with lemon-lime soda.
To serve, scoop desired amount of frozen mixture into a glass, and fill with lemon-lime soda.
